definition[0]: to be used for a particular purpose
example[0]: The land surrounding the village was given over to vineyards.
example[1]: The whole day was given over to cooking and preparing for the celebrations.
definition[1]: to spend all your time doing something
example[2]: In his youth he had given himself over to pleasure.
definition[2]: to give responsibility for or control over something to a particular person, organization etc
example[3]: The running of internal affairs was given over to the Chancellor.
